Name: VR Basketball Sweetie
About the game: This is a training game prepared for shooting enthusiasts. Using the game characteristics of VR, players can ignore the training venue and space. We have prepared a variety of difficulties to meet different degrees of enthusiasts. You only need to win within the prescribed time, the number of times input exceeds the sparring robotic arm. We also prepared a beautiful woman to cheer up. Game operation: The left handle wheel disk controls the character movement. The right handle trigger button generates basketball. Wave the right handle and release the trigger button to complete the shooting action.
